Html:
hello,
I have a little problem when I open my new file.
First time, Excel notify me : 'Excel met an illegible contents in "mynewfile.xlsx"'. I must to click ok.
and the second time, excel notify me that : ' Excel was able to open the file by deleting  the illegible contents'.

I must to clik 'ok' to open my file.
When I save it, this message doesn't return.

So, all the requirements are installed.

Have you got an idea.

PS: Forgive me to my english.
Will need to see the file. Can you send to: erik at phpexcel dot net
